title: Banned for using 3rd party programs although i haven't
body:
Hey,

So my account was recently perma banned for using 3rd party software. The only league related software i do use  Discord for team chats and occasionally plays.tv for recording games, frankly I am not even a good enough player to be ever reported for scripting. Can someone explain what might have triggered this ban and if i can ever get my account back.  I have submitted a ticket to riot but still haven't got any answer.  (link to my match his through op.gg is https://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Blizzard%20Fang)  
Can someone please help me
